mapper.sql: saleRecord.id as id , saleRecord.member_name as memberName , saleRecord.pay_method as payMethod , saleRecord.sale_number as saleNumber , saleRecord.sale_price as salePrice , saleRecord.receivable_amount as receivableAmount , saleRecord.paid_amount as paidAmount , saleRecord.change_amount as changeAmount , saleRecord.cashier_name as cashierName , saleRecord.is_delete as isDelete , saleRecord.directly_org_id as directlyOrgId , saleRecord.hierarchy_id as hierarchyId , saleRecord.creator_id as creatorId , saleRecord.creator as creator , saleRecord.create_time as createTime , saleRecord.updator_id as updatorId , saleRecord.updator as updator , saleRecord.update_time as updateTime , saleRecord.remark1 as remark1 , saleRecord.remark2 as remark2 , saleRecord.remark3 as remark3 , saleRecord.remark4 as remark4

mapper.update:
update sale_record_tb
member_name = #{memberName},
pay_method = #{payMethod},
sale_number = #{saleNumber},
sale_price = #{salePrice},
receivable_amount = #{receivableAmount},
paid_amount = #{paidAmount},
change_amount = #{changeAmount},
